rules_text: Whenever you put a counter on this creature, draw a card, then discard a card unless that counter is a different kind from the other counters on this creature.
notes:
https://www.artstation.com/artwork/GYrRa


OG_4:
Whenever you put a counter on MV4 Augur of Implants, draw a card. Then if that counter is the same kind as another counter on MV4 Augur of Implants, discard a card.

OG_3:
Costed 4U, was a 3/5

OG_2:
Costed 3UU

OG_1:
Whenever you put one or more counters on MV4 Implant Augur, draw a card, then discard a card.
